name: Shwip
description: Dominate global leaderboards as you face off against an onslaught of geometric foes. Shwip combines straight up twin-stick arcade action with tight controls, insane pixel destruction and devastating weapons and abilities. Evade, outlast and play with style in four game modes over single and local multiplayer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: At least DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
